text: James Raymond Greengrass (October 24, 1927 – September 9, 2019) was an American professional baseball player. He appeared in 504 games over five seasons (1952–1956) in Major League Baseball for the Cincinnati Reds/Redlegs and Philadelphia Phillies. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Sportspeople from New York (state)
title: Jim Greengrass
